name: customer-delight-west
description:
You're on the West side of the Customer Delight development area - also known as 'User Experience Alley'.
This is where most of our UX staff in customer delight sit as it's right between all the development teams. There's a window to the west that overlooks one of the car parks.

inventory.detailedDescription: It's pretty much the same view as from downstairs - just one floor higher - people, bikes, car park.

inventory.name: tomato plants
inventory.detailedDescription: They're huge! But they're also rather dry and starting to wilt.
